name: MintStars
intro: An ethical and inclusive subscription platform for models and creators
introduce: MintStars is an NFT subscription platform for creators, models, and their fans. MintStars enables creators to monetize their content through subscriptions and marketplace sales and allows fans to earn money from promoting creators. Fans can collect and resell exclusive content to other fans on the MintStars marketplace, with royalties paid back to the original creator.
